haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Uffz Konrad Herxheimer, Uffz Konrad Herxheimer

 The mission was flown from Lagnicourt aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 08/01/1916 near Baleycourt.
A F.E.2b of Esc 21 was brought down by Marko Kupferblum of FA 46b.
Cpl Anton Lagarrigue was killed in action.
S/Lt Guillaume Neyrat was killed in action.
Marko Kupferblum was  flying a DFW C.V.

On 08/01/1916 near Riviere.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of No 1 Squadron RFC was brought down by Konrad Herxheimer of FA 46b.
Victor Amondsham was killed in action.
Konrad Herxheimer and Patrik Schorner were  flying a DFW C.V.
narrative: An artillery spot.  We porceed to the target and I am engrossed with my task when we are set upon by a pair of Nieuports.  Bullets fly by, some of them striking our crate but to no effect.  I frantically bring my machine gun to engage and open fire.  The range is point blank and I cannot miss.  After several long bursts the first disintegrates in the air.  The second attacks and I fire a long burst into his engine.  He does not go down but at least he leaves us alone.  I call for artillery fire but the damned artillery will not open up.
